name: Coma (Lajeeth Thangavel, jackelly)
description:
A game with multiple endings about a man who got into a tragic accident an must decided if he must talk to life or death and how that will affect his future.

Controls:

Arrow keys/WASD to move

Z to interact with npcs/push blocks

Created by Lajeeth Thangavel (level design and coding), Jack Kelly (level design and coding), Usman Khan (art), and Zane Giordano (sound).
